Brechtgien "Birgitta" Durell, née von Crakow ma ọ bụ von Cracauw (1619 na Hoorn, Netherlands - 1683 na Sweden) bụ onye Swedish (nke mbụ Dutch) onye mmepụta ihe.

Ọ bụ ada Carel van Cracauw, onye nnọchi anya Dutch na Copenhagen, onye nketa ọgaranya yana ndị metụtara ndị ọrụ akụ bara ụba.  N'afọ 1647, ọ lụrụ onye ahịa Sweden bara ọgaranya Magnus Durell, bụ́ onye a na-akwanyere ùgwù obere oge tupu agbamakwụkwọ ha.  Ọ sooro nwunye ya gaa Sweden wee biri na ala ala ya nwetara nso nso a, Vallen Castle dị nso na Laholm..

Ezinụlọ nke nwunye ya nwere, afọ abụọ tupu agbamakwụkwọ ya, e nyere nkwekọrịta site na okpueze iji nye ndị agha Sweden na sọks kpara akpa, nke na-emezubeghị.  Nkwekọrịta ahụ bụ nke onye òtù ọlụlụ ya, mana ebe ọ na-anọghị ya mgbe niile ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ọkwa ya dị ka gọvanọ obodo na onyeisi oche nke Ụlọikpe Göta, Birgitta Durell nyere ọrụ ịhazi na ịchịkwa azụmahịa a.. A kọwara Birgitta Durell dị ka onye na-ebute ụzọ na onye na-echekwa ego
Ọ haziri ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dum gburugburu Vallen Castle

Ọ na-amụta ndị ọrụ ya, wee mee ka ha na-amụrụ ndị ọrụ ugbo gbara ya gburugburu, na nkà nke ịkpa akwa a maara dị ka binge, nke ya mere o webatara. Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ na-ebubata ma zụta ajị anụ, nke e kesara ndị ọrụ ugbo nke Halland, bụ ndị e were n'ọrụ ịkpa sọks maka ndị agha na ọrụ ya.

Ụlọ ọrụ Vallen Castle ma ọ bụ Laholm nwere ihe ịga nke ọma, nkwekọrịta ya na okpueze ahụ bụ nke otu ezinụlọ ahụ ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ: mgbe Birgitta Durell nwụsịrị, ọ bụ nwa ya nwanyị Magna Birgitta durell (1653-1709), mgbe ahụ, nwa nwa ya nwanyị di ya nwụrụ, Clara Sabina Lilliehöök (1686-1758), mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, nwa nwa Magdalena Eleonora Meck (1717-1766), ruo mgbe nkwekọrịta ahụ furu ma Charlotta Richardy weghaara ya ihe karịrị otu narị afọ ka e mesịrị.
